items.label: What kind of projects do you accept?
items.content: I specialize in building SaaS, E-commerce platforms, and premium showcase websites. I can handle full-stack development from scratch (A to Z) or join an existing team to solve specific technical challenges.

items.label: What is your tech stack?
items.content: I develop in Nuxt (Vue.js) for lightning-fast interfaces and Symfony (PHP) for robust backends. This combination allows me to build high-performance, secure, and scalable web applications.

items.label: Do you handle hosting and maintenance?
items.content: Absolutely. My goal is your peace of mind. I can manage the entire project lifecycle: hosting selection, deployment, domain configuration, and monthly maintenance for updates and security.

items.label: How does the collaboration work?
items.content: It starts with a discovery phase to understand your needs. Then, I provide a detailed proposal and quote. Once approved, I build your project with regular milestones (demos) until final delivery and training.

items.label: What are your rates?
items.content: Every project is unique. I usually work on a fixed-price basis for well-defined projects (showcase sites, MVPs), or a daily rate for consulting and long-term support. Feel free to contact me for a custom quote.

items.label: Do you work remotely?
items.content: I work primarily remotely with clients worldwide. I use modern tools to ensure smooth and transparent communication throughout the project.

items.label: Will my website be SEO-friendly?
items.content: Yes, SEO is at the core of my development process. I ensure semantic content structure to guarantee maximum visibility on Google from day one.
